info.title: Ent Schema API
info.description: This is an auto generated API description made out of an Ent schema definition

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

post.description: Creates a new ClaimGroup and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the ClaimGroup with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: ClaimGroup with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the ClaimGroup with the requested ID.

204.description: ClaimGroup with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a ClaimGroup and persists changes to storage.

post.description: Creates a new GroupLink and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the GroupLink with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: GroupLink with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the GroupLink with the requested ID.

204.description: GroupLink with requested ID was deleted

200.description: ClaimGroup attached to GroupLink with requested ID was found

force.description: Set to change user's password without checking the old password

204.description: User with requested ID was deleted

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

base_admin_path.description: Base path for the admin UI when served behind a proxy, e.g. /auth; empty when admin is at /admin/

/login.description: User login and token generation endpoint

provider.description: Provider to login try to login to. This is required when multiple foreign providers are defined.

required_claims.description: Claims required to receive a token. A token is issued if a user matches all given claims of one entry in the list.

items.description: An object that specifies what claims must be present. Set a key value to "" to require a key with any value

filter_claims.description: Claims to include in the created token. All given claims are returned by default

refresh.description: Token to get a new token with the same claims. Must be used before token expires

username.description: Username of the user who logged in

exp.description: Next key expiring time, next time to pull public keys

refresh.description: Refresh token. Must match the token used in authentication
Token to get a new token with the same claims. Must be used before token expires
